issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Deletion of expired workflow executions can fail if there are any activity tasks that are pending. There can be pending tasks if a workflow execution fails, these should be deleted along with the workflow execution.
fields.summary: Clean up of expired workflow executions fails when activity tasks are pending

comments.body:
An example error when this occurs (cloud-error.log) is:

{code}
Wed Oct 22 16:18:00 2014 ERROR [TimeoutManager:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#600] [com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.TimeoutManager.doExpunge(TimeoutManager.java):155] Error processing workflow execution retention expiry
com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.SwfMetadataException: Error deleting workflow-executions by example: [WorkflowExecution domain=Domain workflowType=WorkflowType workflowId=1cbd67bb-6615-48a5-bbe5-38485ca411c4--workflow-id childPolicy=TERMINATE domainName=1cbd67bb-6615-48a5-bbe5-38485ca411c4-domain domainUuid=220dfa91-ee21-40c4-9f44-282d049019a5 taskList=list executionStartToCloseTimeout=60 taskStartToCloseTimeout=null cancelRequested=false decisionStatus=Pending decisionTimestamp=2014-10-22 16:00:39.841 closeStatus=TIMED_OUT closeTimestamp=2014-10-22 16:01:40.318 retentionTimestamp=2014-10-20 15:59:59.999 tagList=org.hibernate.LazyInitializationException: failed to lazily initialize a collection of role: com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.WorkflowExecution.tagList, could not initialize proxy - no Session latestActivityTaskScheduled=2014-10-22 16:00:39.837 latestExecutionContext=null timeoutTimestamp=2014-10-20 15:59:59.999 workflowHistory=org.hibernate.LazyInitializationException: failed to lazily initialize a collection of role: com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.WorkflowExecution.workflowHistory, could not initialize proxy - no Session ownerUserId=AIDKMOXXUIHVLVUCXR3GX ownerUserName=admin ownerAccountNumber=643730331612 uniqueName=643730331612:1cbd67bb-6615-48a5-bbe5-38485ca411c4-domain:09118984-ced2-4f63-8ff2-038d60b704b1 ownerFullNameCached=null state=CLOSED lastState=OPEN stateChangeStack= displayName=09118984-ced2-4f63-8ff2-038d60b704b1 id=8aef85b44939c39e01493a1733de0280 version=3 creationTimestamp=2014-10-21 15:53:58.997 lastUpdateTimestamp=2014-10-22 16:01:40.324 naturalId=77791d1a-7a10-4f0d-a550-da9748299083]
	at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.persist.SwfPersistenceSupport.metadataException(SwfPersistenceSupport.java:50)
	at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.persist.SwfPersistenceSupport.metadataException(SwfPersistenceSupport.java:31)
	at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport.deleteByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:204)
	at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.persist.PersistenceWorkflowExecutions.deleteByExample(PersistenceWorkflowExecutions.java:41)
	at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.TimeoutManager.doExpunge(TimeoutManager.java:152)

	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Caused by: org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException: could not execute statement
	at org.hibernate.exception.internal.SQLStateConversionDelegate.convert(SQLStateConversionDelegate.java:129)

Caused by: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: update or delete on table "swf_workflow_execution" violates foreign key constraint "fk_198cxihke48o6oa4rttq4uwdl" on table "swf_activity_task"
  Detail: Key (id)=(8aef85b44939c39e01493a1733de0280) is still referenced from table "swf_activity_task".
	at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.receiveErrorResponse(QueryExecutorImpl.java:2161)

	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
	at net.sf.hajdbc.util.reflect.Methods.invoke(Methods.java:49)

	at net.sf.hajdbc.util.concurrent.SynchronousExecutor.invokeAll(SynchronousExecutor.java:175)
	at net.sf.hajdbc.util.concurrent.SynchronousExecutor.invokeAll(SynchronousExecutor.java:152)
	at net.sf.hajdbc.invocation.AllResultsCollector.collectResults(AllResultsCollector.java:81)

	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
	at org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxyStatement.invoke(ProxyStatement.java:100)

[~sjones]/[~tony],

Checked for errors mentioned in the ticket on both [Group #1 and Group #2 Clouds|https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/QA/Euca+4.1+Quality+Dashboard].  Looks like issue has been resolved.

_Group #1_
Eucalyptus Version: 4.1.0-0.0.22975.327.20150113git527c000.el6
_Group #2_
Eucalyptus Version:  4.1.0-0.0.22967.321.20150111git3acde28.el6

*Steps*

# After multiple cloudformation stacks deployed on both Group #1 and Group #2 clouds, checked log files for the following errors:
_Group #1 Cloud_
{code}
# grep -i SwfMetadataException /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-* | grep "Error deleting "
#
# grep swf_workflow_execution /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log.3:2015-01-12 03:17:39  INFO | HHH000262: Table not found: swf_workflow_execution
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log.3:2015-01-12 03:17:39  INFO | HHH000262: Table not found: swf_workflow_execution_tags
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log.3:2015-01-12 03:17:39  INFO | HHH000262: Table not found: swf_workflow_execution
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log.3:2015-01-12 03:17:39  INFO | HHH000262: Table not found: swf_workflow_execution_tags
# grep LazyInitializationException /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
#
{code}
_Group #2 Cloud_
{code}
# grep -i SwfMetadataException /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-* | grep "Error deleting "
#
# grep swf_workflow_execution /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log:2015-01-13 11:49:27  INFO | HHH000262: Table not found: swf_workflow_execution
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log:2015-01-13 11:49:27  INFO | HHH000262: Table not found: swf_workflow_execution_tags
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log:2015-01-13 11:49:27  INFO | HHH000262: Table not found: swf_workflow_execution
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log:2015-01-13 11:49:27  INFO | HHH000262: Table not found: swf_workflow_execution_tags
#
# grep LazyInitializationException /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
#
{code}
